testCase.name: IndexComponent Renders without error
IndexComponent should display the TopBar component
handleToggle should set isChecker to true and hideCreate to true when selected option includes "approved"
handleToggle should set isChecker to true and hideCreate to true when selected option includes "sent"
handleToggle should set isChecker to false and hideCreate to false when selected option does not include "approved" or "sent"
handleToggle should not throw an error and change values to 'false' when selected values when selected value is null
handleToggle should not throw an error and change values to 'false' when selected values does not have a text property
handleToggle should not throw an error and change values to 'false' when selected values when selected value has a null text property
handleChange should update query object with selected filter and reset page to 1
handleChange should set status_In property of query object to null when activeType is "all"
handleChange should update query object when activeType is not a valid string
handleChange should update query object when category is not a valid string
handleRefresh should call getProducts and prodStatRefetch with updated query when category is AllProducts
handleRefresh should call getRequests and requestRefetch with updated query when category is Requests
handleRefresh should call getRequests and RequestRefetch when category is undefined
handleRefresh should call getProducts and getStatRefresh when StatusCategory type === 'all products'
handleSearch Should call setQuery with the provided values
IndexComponent handles search input change and sets search state
IndexComponent handles search and calls appropriate functions
handleRequestStatus should set request data to an empty array when query page is 1
handleRequestStatus should map over request results and add request status and type names to each item in request data
handleRequestStatus should concatenate new request data to previous request data using setRequestData
handleRequestStatus should not set request data to an empty array when query page is not 1
handleRequestStatus should not add request status and type names when request results is empty
handleRequestStatus should not concatenate new request data when request results is empty
handleProductStatus should set product data to an empty array when query page is 1
handleProductStatus should concatenate fetched data results to previous product data, mapping each result to include state and productType properties
handleProductStatus should set hasMore to true if there is a next page in the fetched data
handleProductStatus should not modify product data when query page is not 1
handleProductStatus should not modify product data when data fetch is not successful
handleProductStatus should not modify product data when fetched data results are empty
